name: Enter the Gungeon Mobile @rDemo
descriptionShort: Pack, whom goal at porting the well-known roguelike. @r! THIS  IS  A @rDEMO  VERSION  INTENDED  TO  GET  TO KNOW  THE   PROJECT. YOU CAN FOLLOW @yDEVELOPMENT OF @gFULL @gVERSION IN THE OFFICIAL NTM DISCORD SERVER @r!
description: The desert has been replaced with the Hall of the Lead Lord, including environments and mobs. The character selection menu and, in fact, the characters themselves have also been changed: @gFISH - @yBULLET, @sROBOT - robot, who else :D
